Bring Microsoft Teams into the meeting room with Maverick

The explosion of Teams - with over 120 million daily active users brings a brilliant opportunity for the channel, with many leading manufacturers creating bespoke solutions to bring Teams calls and collaboration to life in the workplace.

Get the most from Teams For Meetings with Maverick

Maverick has created a unique ‘Day in the Life Of’ training programme showcasing the latest innovations for Teams in meeting spaces across your customers‘ entire workspace and beyond. We’ll take you through real meetings experiences from an end user and IT prespective. These resources are also available in co branded formats for you to use with your customers.

Just a few reasons your customers need Teams for Meetings... with Maverick.

1

Seamless integration

Microsoft Teams devices are now fullyintegrated with each other. Take your meeting from your phone, to your desk and to your the room.

2

Meetings that move with you

Proximity Join enables smart speedy transfer of meetings, with touch-free interactions.

3

Simplified device management

IOT connectivity allows you to update, manage and maximise your analytics from your library of devices.

4

Simple connectivity

Bring your own device. No logging in remembering passwords and waiting for the two step verification text. Just your trusted devices.

5

Devices working together

Coordinated join configures MTR devices and Surface Hubs to work together. Use multiple devices on the same call without echo and delays.

6

Present at the click of a button

Screen sharing is made instant with the Clickshare presentation devices, allowing you and your team members to get collaborating.

7

Meetings that go beyond the screen

Content cameras are enhanced by intelligent capture capabilities which improve image quality and expand in room sharing possibilities.

8

Microsoft Whiteboard

Take your collaboration to the next level. Enable in room sharing with the same experience as the in room participant.

Maximise the Teams For Meetings opportunity with Maverick

Maverick has created a training programme and ‘Day in the Life Of’ narrative, to deep dive into how the latest innovations can be used in meeting spaces, and how Teams integrates into communication across all elements of a workspace. We’ll take you through meeting scenarios and how the IT manager and end user experiences Teams for Meetings. The deck is also available in co branded formats for you to use with your customers.
